title: Deploy configuration
description: The deploy schema is used by kube_deploy_tools to configure itself.

artifacts.title: artifacts
artifacts.description: Any usage of kdt must involve at least one artifact. These artifacts can help you create permutations of your deploy with slightly different configurations.

artifact_registries.title: Artifact registries
artifact_registries.description: A deploy configuration requires at least one artifact registry. The image registry tells `kdt publish` how to store your deploy artifacts and tells `kdt deploy` where to find them.

exclude_dir.title: Directory exclusions
exclude_dir.description: Exclude these directory globs underneath `kubernetes/` from this artifact. Do not use together with `include_dir`.

flavors.title: flavors
flavors.description: The flavor is the most granular dimension for customizing the output of your Kubernetes manifests. Specify flavor names and associated flags in this field.

hooks.title: The hooks schema
hooks.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

image_registries.title: Image registries
image_registries.description: A deploy configuration requires at least one image registry. The image registry tells `kdt push` how to retag and push your images and tells `kdt generate` what to populate for `config['image_registry']`.

include_dir.title: Directory inclusions
include_dir.description: Include only these directory globs underneath `kubernetes/` into this artifact. Do not use with `exclude_dir` together.

version.title: version
version.description: Specify the major version of the deploy schema that you are using. The current version is 2.

artifact.title: artifact
artifact.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

image_registry.title: image_registry
image_registry.description: Each artifact must specify the `name` of a value in `image_registries` to be used for images relating to this artifact.

name.title: The name schema
name.description: The unique name of the artifact. Among other places, this ends up showing up in `build/kubernetes/<NAME>_<FLAVOR>`.

artifact_registry.title: Artifact Registry
artifact_registry.description: An artifact registry is the instantiation of an artifact registry driver, configuration for that driver, and a unique name.

config.title: Artifact registry configuration
config.description: Driver-specific key-value pairs used to configure this artifact registry.

driver.title: Artifact registry driver
driver.description: Select a driver to use for this artifact registry. Supported destinations are `gcs` (Google Cloud Storage) and `artifactory`.

name.title: Artifact registry name
name.description: A unique name for this artifact registry.

flags.title: flags
flags.description: flags are used in various parts of the deploy schema to specify key-value pairs that will be placed into `config`. In ascending order, the precedence of flags overwriting each other are: `default_flags`, flags of an `artifact`, then flags of a `flavor`.

flavor.title: flavor
flavor.description: A flavor is defined by a name and its flags.

name.title: Name of the flavor.
name.description: The unique name of the flavor. Among other places, this ends up showing up in `build/kubernetes/<NAME>_<FLAVOR>`.

image_registry.title: Image Registry
image_registry.description: An image registry is the instantiation of an image registry driver, configuration for that driver, and a unique name.

config.title: Image registry configuration
config.description: Driver-specific key-value pairs used to configure this image registry.

driver.title: Image registry driver
driver.description: Select a driver to use for this image registry. Supported destinations are local (no-op), AWS ECR, and GCP GCR.

name.title: Image registry name
name.description: A unique name for this image registry.

prefix.title: Image registry prefix
prefix.description: Images tagged with local-registry will be retagged with this prefix and an appropriate version tag.
